personal.name: Gourav Jagga
personal.title: Java Backend Developer
personal.tagline: Backend-focused Java Developer with 4+ years of experience in designing, developing, and deploying secure and scalable microservices using Spring Boot, JPA/Hibernate, and Kafka. Proven expertise in performance optimization, concurrency handling, and system design for enterprise-level clients.

paragraphs: As a backend-focused Java developer at Alert Enterprise, I specialize in building secure, high-performance microservices that handle millions of transactions daily. My work focuses on enterprise-level solutions for clients like Wells Fargo, where I've engineered systems processing 57M records per hour.

I'm passionate about performance optimization and security. Whether it's reducing inter-service latency by 65% through SFTP-based cache synchronization or implementing configuration-driven data masking to prevent 200+ potential breaches annually, I believe in writing code that's both fast and secure.
Beyond individual contributions, I mentor junior engineers and actively contribute to system architecture decisions, always keeping scalability and maintainability at the forefront of design choices.

experience.description: Leading development of high-performance microservices and mentoring junior engineers while optimizing enterprise-level systems for major financial institutions.
achievements: Engineered SFTP-based cache synchronization (PGP-encrypted) between 5+ microservices, reducing inter-service latency by 65% (from 1.2s â†’ 0.4s per 10MB payload)
Redesigned chunk-based processing with dynamic thread pooling, achieving 3.8x faster bulk data loads (15M records/hr â†’ 57M records/hr) for Wells Fargo
Mentored 3 junior engineers on MVEL policy templates, reducing authorization logic bugs by 48%
Implemented advanced concurrency patterns using Executor Framework for optimal resource utilization

experience.description: Developed secure microservices with focus on PII data protection, workflow optimization, and compliance for enterprise clients including Wells Fargo.
achievements: Developed configuration-driven masking for PII fields (SSN, DOB), preventing 200+ potential breaches for Wells Fargo's 1.2M identities
Optimized multi-threaded approval workflows, reducing latency from 8s â†’ 2.3s for 10K+ daily requests
Implemented runtime policy evaluation for workflows, replacing 300+ hardcoded checks and improving audit compliance to 100%
Built Kafka-based event-driven architecture for real-time data synchronization across microservices

experience.description: Applied design patterns and resolved critical bugs in Java/Spring MVC applications, contributing to system stability and code quality improvements.
achievements: Applied design patterns (Strategy/Factory) to SMTP notification system, reducing code duplication by 70% across 8 modules
Fixed 65+ authorization flaws in Java/Spring MVC, improving system stability by 35%
Contributed to REST API development and integration testing using JUnit and Mockito

projects.title: HSC (High Security Compliance Platform)
projects.description: Enterprise-grade security and compliance platform providing real-time data masking, encrypted data transfers, and comprehensive audit trails for financial institutions. Handles 5TB+ monthly data processing with zero security incidents.
features: Real-time configuration-driven data masking for PII fields (SSN, DOB, etc.)
SFTP pipelines with PGP encryption for cross-microservice transfers
Processing 5TB+ monthly data with zero security incidents
Reduced compliance risks by 50% and prevented 200+ potential breaches annually

projects.title: Guardian (Access Management System)
projects.description: Dynamic access management and provisioning platform with tier-based approval workflows, customizable UI configurations, and automated compliance enforcement for enterprise clients.
features: Dynamic UI customization with variable field lengths
Tier-based email notification system for approval workflows
Runtime policy evaluation engine using MVEL templates

projects.title: PIA Solutions (Privacy Impact Assessment)
projects.description: Automated privacy impact assessment platform helping organizations comply with GDPR, CCPA, and other data protection regulations. Features intelligent data discovery, risk scoring, and comprehensive compliance reporting.
features: Automated privacy assessments with AI-driven risk scoring
Configurable data masking rules and policies
Real-time compliance monitoring and reporting dashboard
Comprehensive audit trail and activity logging
Integration with existing enterprise security systems
